item.title: Music?
item.dc:creator: @cows1471 cows1471
item.description:
@cows1471 wrote:

[quote=“johno2, post:8, topic:289106”][quote author=cows1471 link=topic=382200.msg2870944#msg2870944 date=1247761616]

what kind of music do you want like rs sounds or just regular music

i got regular runescape music.
[/quote]

What, like it playing from a Music Player? Or from the cache? If it was music player, edit in client.java and GUi.java - silabsoft tutorial.

If it was the cache music, sprite.java (moparscape tutorial)[/quote]

Id want it like real rs.

Read full topic
